Parameter.Label: Maximum dim level
Parameter.Help: Maximum Level, a limit on the maximum level the dimmer can reach. Levels larger than 99 will simply be interpreted as 99 ie. no limit.

Parameter.Label: Report node
Parameter.Help: Report Node, reports changes in level to this node id. Disabled if 0.

Parameter.Label: B&O IR support
Parameter.Help: B&O IR support is disabled if 0 otherwise enabled.

Parameter.Label: Dimming type
Parameter.Help: Dimming Type, trailing edge enabled if 0 otherwise leading edge enabled.

Parameter.Label: Dimming level duration
Parameter.Help: Default Dimming Level Duration, how long time it takes to dim one level in 0.01s.

Parameter.Label: Set level duration
Parameter.Help: Default Set Level Duration, how long time it takes to set one level in 0.01s.

Parameter.Label: Long dim duration
Parameter.Help: Long Dim Duration, time to use dimming to level 0 when double clicking. Format is the same as multilevel switch duration.

Parameter.Label: Touch press time
Parameter.Help: Touch Press Time, time for presses to register as seperate and not part of a sequence, measured in 0.01s. 0 is interpreted as a 1.

Parameter.Label: Touch Multiple Press Time
Parameter.Help: Touch Multiple Press Time, has no specific usage is this product, shouldn't be changed.

Parameter.Label: Touch Hold Time
Parameter.Help: Touch Hold Time, time for presses to register as being held down in 0.01s. 0 is interpreted asa1.

Parameter.Label: Network Update Interval
Parameter.Help: Network Update Interval, time between network updates in 256 seconds. Disabled if 0.

Parameter.Label: Rediscover Interval
Parameter.Help: Rediscover Interval, time between rediscoveries in 256 seconds. Disabled if 0.
